content.en: Replication optimization: Researchers have been investigating various algorithms for data replication in cloud computing and distributed systems. These algorithms, such as Quantum Evolutionary Algorithm (QEA), ant-algorithm, glowworm swarm optimization, and Tabu search, are being used to develop strategies for replica creation, selection, and management. The goal is to optimize the performance and efficiency of data replication in these environments.
content.da: Replikationsoptimering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer til datareplikation i cloud computing og distribuerede systemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom Quantum Evolutionary Algorithm (QEA), myre-algoritme, glowworm swarm optimering og Tabu-søgning, anvendes til at udvikle strategier for replikatskabelse, -valg og -styring. Målet er at optimere ydeevnen og effektiviteten af datareplikation i disse miljøer.
